verses.verse: Open <WH6605> thy doors <WH1817>, O Lebanon <WH3844>, that the fire <WH784> may devour <WH398> thy cedars <WH730>.

Wail <WH3213>, O fir-tree <WH1265>, for the cedar <WH730> is fallen <WH5307>, because the goodly <WH117> ones are destroyed <WH7703>: wail <WH3213>, O ye oaks <WH437> of Bashan <WH1316>, for the strong <WH1208> forest <WH3293> is come down <WH3381>.

A voice <WH6963> of the wailing <WH3215> of the shepherds <WH7462>! for their glory <WH155> is destroyed <WH7703>: a voice <WH6963> of the roaring <WH7581> of young lions <WH3715>! for the pride <WH1347> of the Jordan <WH3383> is laid waste <WH7703>.
Thus said <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>: Feed <WH7462> the flock <WH6629> of slaughter <WH2028>;

whose possessors <WH7069> slay <WH2026> them <WH816>, and hold themselves not guilty; and they that sell <WH4376> them say <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah <WH3068>, for I am rich <WH6238>; and their own shepherds <WH7462> pity them not <WH2550>.

For I will no more pity <WH2550> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>; but <WH4672>, lo, I will deliver the men <WH120> every one <WH376> into his neighbor <WH7453>'s hand <WH3027>, and into the hand <WH3027> of his king <WH4428>; and they shall smite <WH3807> the land <WH776>, and out of their hand <WH3027> I will not deliver them <WH5337>.

So I fed <WH7462> the flock <WH6629> of slaughter <WH2028>, verily <WH3651> the poor <WH6041> of the flock <WH6629>. And I took <WH3947> unto me two <WH8147> staves <WH4731>; the one <WH259> I called <WH7121> Beauty <WH5278>, and the other <WH259> I called <WH7121> Bands <WH2254>; and I fed <WH7462> the flock <WH6629>.
And I cut off <WH3582> the three <WH7969> shepherds <WH7462> in one <WH259> month <WH3391>; for my soul <WH5315> was weary <WH7114> of them <WH5315>, and their soul also loathed me <WH973>.

Then said <WH559> I <WH7462>, I will not feed you <WH4191>: that which dieth, let it die <WH4191>; and that which is to be cut off <WH3582>, let it be cut off <WH3582>; and let them that are left <WH7604> eat <WH398> every one <WH802> the flesh <WH1320> of another <WH7468>.
And I took <WH3947> my staff <WH4731> Beauty <WH5278>, and cut it asunder <WH1438>, that I might break <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285> which I had made <WH3772> with all the peoples <WH5971>.
And it was broken <WH6565> in that day <WH3117>; and thus the poor <WH6041> of the flock <WH6629> that gave heed <WH8104> unto me knew <WH3045> that it was the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And I said <WH559> unto them <WH5869>, If ye think good <WH2896>, give <WH3051> me my hire <WH7939>; and if not <WH2308>, forbear. So they weighed <WH8254> for my hire thirty <WH7970> pieces of silver <WH3701>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH7993>, Cast it unto the potter <WH3335>, the goodly <WH145> price <WH3366> that I was prized at <WH3365> by them <WH3947>. And I took the thirty <WH7970> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and cast <WH7993> them unto the potter <WH3335>, in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
Then I cut asunder <WH1438> mine other <WH8145> staff <WH4731>, even Bands <WH2254>, that I might break <WH6565> the brotherhood <WH264> between Judah <WH3063> and Israel <WH3478>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH3947>, Take unto thee yet again the instruments <WH3627> of a foolish <WH196> shepherd <WH7462>.

For <WH6965>, lo, I will raise up a shepherd <WH7462> in the land <WH776>, who will not visit <WH6485> those that are cut off <WH3582>, neither will seek <WH1245> those that are scattered <WH5289>, nor heal <WH7495> that which is broken <WH7665>, nor feed <WH3557> that which is sound <WH5324>; but he will eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of the fat <WH1277> sheep <WH6561>, and will tear their hoofs <WH6541> in pieces <WH6561>.

Woe <WH1945> to the worthless <WH457> shepherd <WH7473> that leaveth <WH5800> the flock <WH6629>! the sword <WH2719> shall be upon his arm <WH2220>, and upon his right <WH3225> eye <WH5869>: his arm <WH2220> shall be clean <WH3001> dried up <WH3001>, and his right <WH3225> eye <WH5869> shall be utterly <WH3543> darkened <WH3543>.
